page.title: 04Recreation-Bee Keeping
page.content: Miss. Gunnell is the church organist and choir mistress. She has been keeping bees for twen- ty four years.She has four hives,from September to April the bees are shut in and she gives them forty lbs of food.She opens the hives.She smokes the hives to make the bees drowsy and before they sleep they swallow as much honey as they can because they think the hive is on fire.She removes the rest of the honey combs cooks them and puts the honey into jars.She gets twenty lbs of honey from one hive. From April to September the bees fly free collecting pollen.Sometimes she has them taken onto the fells to produce heather honey. Bees are fascinating insects having special dances to give each other messages.They only sting when annoyed. All bee keepers get stung.
